extracted_playbook.title: Identify CODESYS Development System Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check the installed version of the CODESYS Development System to determine if it is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the CODESYS Development System version < 3.5.19.20?
Which method to update the CODESYS Development System?

extracted_playbook.title: Update CODESYS Development System via CODESYS Installer
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install the CODESYS Development System version 3.5.19.20 using the CODESYS Installer.

extracted_playbook.title: Update CODESYS Development System via CODESYS Store
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install the CODESYS Development System version 3.5.19.20 from the CODESYS Store.

extracted_playbook.title: Update CODESYS Development System via CODESYS Update Area
extracted_playbook.description: Obtain further information and download the CODESYS Development System version 3.5.19.20 from the CODESYS Update area.
